title: In which universities in Europe, US or Japan I can study for completely free, if I’m not EU citizen but have good score in SAT, ACT etc. and good high school grades in my country and also already entered to an university in my country? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United States of America

response.answer_text: Please do not expect foreigners to pay your luxury to study in their countries. Studying in developed countries can cost about USD 200,000 for 4 years bachelor level. That is one to three nice houses in Lagos, Bangalore, Jakarta, Manila. Scholarship may exist but unless you are the top 0.1 % of the smartest students in your country, do not even dream about it.
